_header: A mine heart remember thee well
Note:
Cf. 1; Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 81.
_description: A song of penitence — two stanzas rhyme royal with 2-line refrain

BLAdd5465.First Lines: A myn hart remembir þe well…
